item.title: SEACHANGE INTERNATIONAL INC 10-K
item.description: SEACHANGE INTERNATIONAL INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 08, 2022 had 29541 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
